about_the_game:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #3


Introducing Mini-Dungeon Monthly , the monthly RPG zine from AAW Games!

Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures for 5th Edition.

Want the digital color map and token pack? Subscribe to Mini-Dungeon Monthly in PDF and print

Five adventures included!
Assault on Ataraxia
A difficult adventure for four to six characters of 1st to 3rd level by Thilo Graf

Umbravania: First Blood of the Wolf Moon
An adventure for three to four characters of 4th to 6th level by Justin Andrew Mason

Some of the Parts
An adventure for four to five characters of 6th or 7th level by Stephen Yeardley

Maelora's Academy for Drow Operatives
An adventure for four to six characters of 6th to 8th level by Jonathan G. Nelson

Survive: In an Elemental Centrifuge
An adventure for four characters level 12th to 14th by Jonathan G. Nelson

Converted by: Russell Campbell

Released on August 12, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
detailed_description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #3


Introducing Mini-Dungeon Monthly , the monthly RPG zine from AAW Games!

Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures for 5th Edition.

Want the digital color map and token pack? Subscribe to Mini-Dungeon Monthly in PDF and print

Five adventures included!
Assault on Ataraxia
A difficult adventure for four to six characters of 1st to 3rd level by Thilo Graf

Umbravania: First Blood of the Wolf Moon
An adventure for three to four characters of 4th to 6th level by Justin Andrew Mason

Some of the Parts
An adventure for four to five characters of 6th or 7th level by Stephen Yeardley

Maelora's Academy for Drow Operatives
An adventure for four to six characters of 6th to 8th level by Jonathan G. Nelson

Survive: In an Elemental Centrifuge
An adventure for four characters level 12th to 14th by Jonathan G. Nelson

Converted by: Russell Campbell

Released on August 12, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #3 (5E)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
